001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerator;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParser;
010
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.util.JsonUtil;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.util.XmlEventUtil;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
016
017import org.codehaus.stax2.XMLEventReader2;
018import org.codehaus.stax2.XMLStreamWriter2;
019import org.codehaus.stax2.evt.XMLEventFactory2;
020
021import java.io.IOException;
022
023import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
024import javax.xml.stream.XMLEventWriter;
025import javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException;
026import javax.xml.stream.events.Characters;
027import javax.xml.stream.events.StartElement;
028import javax.xml.stream.events.XMLEvent;
029
030import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
031
032/**
033 * Provides a basic Java type adapter implementation. This implementation should
034 * be the parent class of all Java type adapter implementations.
035 *
036 * @param <TYPE>
037 *          the raw Java type this adapter supports
038 * @param <ITEM_TYPE>
039 *          the metapath item type corresponding to the raw Java type supported
040 *          by the adapter
041 */
042public abstract class AbstractDataTypeAdapter<TYPE, ITEM_TYPE extends IAnyAtomicItem>
043    implements IDataTypeAdapter<TYPE> {
044  /**
045   * The default JSON property name for a Metaschema field value.
046   */
047  public static final String DEFAULT_JSON_FIELD_VALUE_NAME = "STRVALUE";
048
049  @NonNull
050  private final Class<TYPE> clazz;
051
052  /**
053   * Construct a new Java type adapter for a provided class.
054   *
055   * @param clazz
056   *          the Java type this adapter supports
057   */
058  protected AbstractDataTypeAdapter(@NonNull Class<TYPE> clazz) {
059    this.clazz = clazz;
060  }
061
062  @Override
063  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
064  public TYPE toValue(Object value) {
065    return (TYPE) value;
066  }
067
068  @Override
069  public Class<TYPE> getJavaClass() {
070    return clazz;
071  }
072
073  @Override
074  public boolean canHandleQName(QName nextQName) {
075    return false;
076  }
077
078  @Override
079  public String getDefaultJsonValueKey() {
080    return DEFAULT_JSON_FIELD_VALUE_NAME;
081  }
082
083  @Override
084  public boolean isUnrappedValueAllowedInXml() {
085    return false;
086  }
087
088  @Override
089  public boolean isXmlMixed() {
090    return false;
091  }
092
093  @Override
094  public TYPE parse(XMLEventReader2 eventReader) throws IOException {
095    StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();
096    XMLEvent nextEvent;
097    try {
098      while (!(nextEvent = eventReader.peek()).isEndElement()) {
099        if (!nextEvent.isCharacters()) {
100          throw new IOException(String.format("Invalid content '%s' at %s", XmlEventUtil.toString(nextEvent),
101              XmlEventUtil.toString(nextEvent.getLocation())));
102        }
103        Characters characters = nextEvent.asCharacters();
104        builder.append(characters.getData());
105        // advance past current event
106        eventReader.nextEvent();
107      }
108
109      // trim leading and trailing whitespace
110      String value = ObjectUtils.notNull(builder.toString().trim());
111      try {
112        return parse(value);
113      } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
114        throw new IOException(
115            String.format("Malformed data '%s'%s. %s",
116                value,
117                XmlEventUtil.generateLocationMessage(nextEvent),
118                ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
119            ex);
120      }
121    } catch (XMLStreamException ex) {
122      throw new IOException(ex);
123    }
124  }
125
126  /**
127   * This default implementation will parse the value as a string and delegate to
128   * the string-based parsing method.
129   */
130  @Override
131  public TYPE parse(JsonParser parser) throws IOException {
132    String value = parser.getValueAsString();
133    if (value == null) {
134      throw new IOException("Unable to null value as text");
135    }
136    // skip over value
137    parser.nextToken();
138    try {
139      return parse(value);
140    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
141      throw new IOException(
142          String.format("Malformed data '%s'%s. %s",
143              value,
144              JsonUtil.generateLocationMessage(parser),
145              ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
146          ex);
147    }
148  }
149
150  @SuppressWarnings("null")
151  @Override
152  public String asString(Object value) {
153    return value.toString();
154  }
155
156  @Override
157  public void writeXmlValue(
158      Object value,
159      StartElement parent,
160      XMLEventFactory2 eventFactory,
161      XMLEventWriter eventWriter)
162      throws IOException, XMLStreamException {
163    try {
164      String content = asString(value);
165      Characters characters = eventFactory.createCharacters(content);
166      eventWriter.add(characters);
167    } catch (XMLStreamException ex) {
168      throw new IOException(ex);
169    }
170  }
171
172  @Override
173  public void writeXmlValue(Object value, QName parentName, XMLStreamWriter2 writer) throws XMLStreamException {
174    String content = asString(value);
175    writer.writeCharacters(content);
176  }
177
178  @Override
179  public void writeJsonValue(Object value, JsonGenerator generator) throws IOException {
180    generator.writeString(asString(value));
181  }
182
183  @Override
184  public abstract Class<ITEM_TYPE> getItemClass();
185
186  @Override
187  public abstract ITEM_TYPE newItem(Object value);
188
189  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
190  @Override
191  public ITEM_TYPE cast(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
192    if (item == null) {
193      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException("item is null");
194    }
195    return getItemClass().isAssignableFrom(item.getClass())
196        ? (ITEM_TYPE) item
197        : castInternal(item);
198  }
199
200  /**
201   * Attempt to cast the provided item to this adapter's item type.
202   * <p>
203   * The default implementation of this will attempt to parse the provided item as
204   * a string using the {@link #parse(String)} method. If this behavior is
205   * undesirable, then a subclass should override this method.
206   *
207   * @param item
208   *          the item to cast
209   * @return the item casted to this adapter's item type
210   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
211   *           if the casting of the item is not possible because the item
212   *           represents an invalid value for this adapter's item type
213   */
214  @NonNull
215  protected ITEM_TYPE castInternal(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
216    // try string based casting as a fallback
217    String itemString = item.asString();
218    try {
219      TYPE value = parse(itemString);
220      return newItem(value);
221    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
222      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(
223          String.format("The value '%s' is not compatible with the type '%s'", itemString, getItemClass().getName()),
224          ex);
225    }
226  }
227}
